For example, Vidyard shares information with our service providers who assist Vidyard with marketing, data hosting and credit card payments.

Vidyard may share and disclose information and technical data in the following circumstances:
Vidyard uses the information for the purposes of facilitating the requested communication.

If you link your Vidyard account with your favorite social media profile such as Google+, Facebook, or YouTube, we may collect certain information from the social media platform through their respective API services (e.g. through the use of YouTube API services).
We also collect information when you call us, visit our offices or interact with us at an event.
We may also collect: Information from our sales and advertising partners.

We use aggregate data to help us understand how customers, viewers and other individuals use and interact with the Vidyard Websites and Services, to improve our products, services and brands, generate reports and market Vidyard.
We use analytics and aggregated data to improve our business.

The data we collect includes your IP address, browser type, how you interact with the Vidyard Websites and more.
We use this data for several reasons, such as to customize your experience or to assist Vidyard and our partners with targeted advertising.
Like many websites, Vidyard uses cookies, etags, web beacons and other similar technologies to automatically collect certain technical data from your computer or mobile device.

We also log the details of your visits to our Services and certain information generated in the course of using our Services, such as mouse movements, clicks, page visits, text entered, how long you spent on a page, and other details of your actions on our website.

If you choose to take advantage of this functionality, Vidyard Services may require you to provide Vidyard with certain information about the person with whom you wish to communicate (e.g., name, email address, etc.).

Vidyard collects personal information that you give to us when you: Provide us with your name, email address or other identifying information before or after viewing a video provided through the Vidyard Websites or the Vidyard Services.
